dmca.title: Infringement of Excalibur Entertainment, Inc. 's Federally Registered Copyrights
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: HR [mailto:hr@moviefilmfest.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 16, 2005 6:02 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Infringement of Excalibur Entertainment, Inc. 's Federally
Registered Copyrights

Lance Crosby, Esq.,

Is ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. (http://www.theplanet.com)
presently responsible for hosting a site located at
http://www.picpornstar.com?

The aforementioned web site is utilizing material infringed upon from
Excalibur Entertainment, Inc. (http://www.excaliburfilms.com), including
twenty-three (23) porn star biographies created at our expense for our
specific use.

I am prepared to forward a NOI in accordance with the provisions of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act identifying said material.

Please reply at your earliest convenience.

Sincerely,

Vince Sanchez
Excalibur Entertainment, Inc.
3621 W. Commonwealth Ave
Fullerton, CA 92833
(714) 773-5855, Ext. 303
